TheLegionAthanatos.name: The Legion Athanatos
TheLegionAthanatos.description: Embark on a journey as mercenaries for the Gods of the Greek Pantheon.

TheBerylliumParadox.name: The Beryllium Paradox
TheBerylliumParadox.description: Jump aboard the Beryllium Paradox, an ancient sky ship piloted by the Captain in search of a successor for reasons not yet known.
